APP_STORE_CONNECT_API_KEY_ID.description: ID da chave API do App Store Connect

APP_STORE_CONNECT_ISSUER_ID.description: Issuer ID da sua conta do App Store Connect
APP_STORE_CONNECT_ISSUER_ID.instructions: Encontre em App Store Connect > Users and Access > Keys

DEVELOPMENT_TEAM.description: Team ID do Apple Developer Program
DEVELOPMENT_TEAM.instructions: Encontre em Apple Developer Portal > Membership

EXPO_TOKEN.description: Token do Expo para builds automatizados
